data.text: @vladamir_12 @bowmark9 @nevillehurst2 Just because the conservatives have said something doesn't make it untrue. Even a stopped clock is right twice a day, and vaccines are really far more boring than the anti-vax nutters let on. You find a common antigen, render it inert, and find a way to preserve it in transport

@xraypat @nevillehurst2 Having the vaccine doesn't stop transmission to others. I would look into these new types of vaccines very carefully before making a decision. Do not believe everything the government tell you.

@nevillehurst2 It’s NOT untested...it’s vital to stop transmission to others...it’s not just for yourself...other vulnerable people could die because they catch it from someone who refuses to be vaccinated...that’s selfish

@Comma_Dan @nevillehurst2 U can transmit the virus to others.after having the so called vaccine. And you will still be able to end up with the virus yourself.O and the vaccines are killing people as well.tho I except the majority of people will be ok.just as with people getting covid.

@nevillehurst2 The vaccines absolutely were tested. I appreciate if you don't care if you get covid, or associated complications, but you may also transmit it to someone who hasn't been offered a vaccine yet and doesn't want to catch it. Get the damn vaccine, it's just deactivated antigens
